Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
READ: I am going to ask you about the time you spent being physically active in the last 7 days. Please answer each question even if you do not consider yourself to be an active person. Think about the activities you do at work, as part of your house and yard work, to get from place to place, and in your spare time for recreation, exercise or sport.

READ: Now, think about all the vigorous activities which take hard physical effort that you did in the last 7 days. Vigorous activities make you breathe much harder than normal, and may include heavy lifting, digging, aeribics, or fast bicycling. Think only about those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. During the <font color = "blue"> last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue"> vigorous</font> physical activities ?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 days per week 
 1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 8, Don't Know/Not Sure 
 9, Refused

Field.ElementLabel:
[Interviewer clarification: Think only about those physical activities you did for at
least 10 minutes at a time.]

2. How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical
activities on one of those days?

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 960 minutes
998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
999 = Refused

Field.ElementLabel: <font color = "blue">[Interviewer clarification: Think only about those physical activities you do for at least 10 minutes at a time.]</font>

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
[Interviewer probe] An average time for one of the days on which you do vigorous activity is being sought. If the respondent can't answer because the pattern of time spent varies widely from day to day,
Ask: "How much time in total would you spend over the last 7 days doing vigorous physical activities?"

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 6720 minutes
9998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
9999 = Refused

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: READ: Now think about activities which take moderate physical effort that you did in the last 7 days. Moderate physical activities make you breathe somewhat harder than normal and may include carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis. Do not include walking. Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.
Field.ElementLabel: 3. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue">moderate</font> physical activities?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 days per week 
 1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 8, Don't Know/Not Sure 
 9, Refused

Field.ElementLabel:
[Interviewer clarification: Think only about those physical activities you do for at
least 10 minutes at a time.]
4. How much time did you usually spend doing <font color = "blue">moderate</font> physical activities on one of those days?

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 960 minutes
998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
999 = Refused

Field.ElementLabel: <font color = "blue">[Interviewer clarification: Think about only those physical activities you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.]</font>

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
[Interviewer probe] An average time for one of the days on which you do moderate activity is being sought. If the respondent can't answer because the pattern of time spent varies widely from day to day, or includes time spent in multiple jobs,
Ask: "What is the total amount of time you spent over the last 7 days doing moderate physical activities?"

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 6720 minutes
9998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
9999 = Refused

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: READ: Now think about the time you spent walking in the last 7 days. This includes at work and at home, walking to travel from place to place, and any other walking that you might do solely for recreation, sport, exercise, or leisure.
Field.ElementLabel: 5. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">walk</font> for at least 10 minutes at a time?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 days per week 
 1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 8, Don't Know/Not Sure 
 9, Refused

Field.ElementLabel: <font color = "blue">[Interviewer clarification: Think only about the walking that you do for at least 10 minutes at a time.]</font>
6. How much time did you usually spend <font color = "blue">walking</font> on one of those days ?

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 960 minutes
998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
999 = Refused

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
[Interviewer probe] An average time for one of the days on which you walk is being sought. If the respondent can't answer because the pattern of time spent varies widely from day to day,
Ask: "What is the total amount of time you spent walking over the last 7 days?"

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 6720 minutes
9998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
9999 = Refused

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: READ: Now think about the time you spent sitting on week days during the last 7 days. Include time spent at work, at home, while doing course work, and during leisure time. This may include time spent sitting at a desk, visiting friends, reading or sitting or lying down to watch television.
Field.ElementLabel: 7. During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend <font color = "blue">sitting</font> on a <font color = "blue">week day</font>?

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 960 minutes
998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
999 = Refused

Field.ElementLabel: <font color = "blue">[Interviewer clarification: Include time spent lying down (awake) as well as sitting.]</font>

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
[Interviewer probe] An average time for one of the days on which you do moderate activity is being sought. If the respondent can't answer because the pattern of time spent varies widely from day to day, or includes time spent in multiple jobs,
Ask: "What is the total amount of time you spent over the last 7 days doing moderate physical activities?"

Field.ElementNote:
range 0 to 960 minutes
998 = Don't Know/Not Sure
999 = Refused
